comments:
description:
IllegalArgumentException thrown out after create a xml data set 

steps to reproduce:
1. create a xml data source without schema
2. create a xml data set leave source data empty
3. come to edit data set dialog

actual result:
IllegalArgumentException thrown out 

exception stack trace
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument cannot be null

In edit data set dialog, when the page has been activated, the url of the xml data set will be set "" instead of null value. So this exception can be turned away.
